resources.string: Dette domenet har blitt tillatt. For å blokkere det, bruk knappen nedenfor.
Dette domenet er blokkert. For å tillate det i fremtiden, bruk knappen nedenfor.
This domain was not correctly resolved by the DNS server. Either the server blocked the domain or it doesn\'t exist.
Something went wrong while resolving this domain, The DNS server answered with a error code.
This domain was blocked because it\'s a CName for a blocked domain. To allow it in the future you can either add the CName or the domain itself to the allowed hosts.

Filters are now configured with %s rules. Your device allows max %s MB of memory for every application, and up to %s rules can fit into it.
Remember, this is just an estimate and Blokada utilises the most memory when it merges the lists. If you enabled a few of them recently, wait a few minutes for the system to free up memory.
How to use the new UI? Tap here for intro.

You are currently in the Home section, there is more if you swipe right. Each of them has its own bottom menu - open it by swiping up.

On Android TV, navigate the UI with the dpad. Use the center key to open the bottom menu, or any item you select. Buttons are marked with the up, down, left or right arrow - use the direction keys to click them.
Psst... Noen elementer har spørsmålstegnikonet på dem. Hvis du trykker på den, vises en kort hjelpemelding, som denne!
Legg til en ny vert i blokkeringslisten
Legg til en ny vert i hvitelisten
Angi domener atskilt med komma. Du kan også lime inn en kobling til hvilken som helst vertsliste, eller importere en lokal vertslistefil.
Dette ser ikke ut som noe for meg.
Angi navn for den nye oppføringen. Du kan også generere et foreslått navn.
Dette ser ikke ut som noe for meg.
Denne appen er hvitelistet, noe som betyr at det ikke utføres noen blokkering eller filtrering på den.
You can make this app bypass Blokada in order to stop blocking any traffic for it. Remember, bypassed apps communicate outside of the VPN.
Denne handlingen er ikke tilgjengelig ennå.

You can sync the DNS servers list with our servers without losing your custom entries.

Alternatively, you can drop all entries (including yours), and download them again.
You can change where the configuration is saved to (and loaded from). If you are importing existing settings, please select Import first, otherwise they will be overwritten.

You can sync the filters list with our servers without losing your custom entries.

Alternatively, you can drop all entries (including yours), and download them again.
This entry does not have any description.

When the app is Active, you will see the key icon in the notification bar at the top of the screen, which means your device is protected. You can turn the app off using the button below, or by swiping down the bottom menu.
Visit our community for help or just to be part of it.
Når dette er aktivert, vil Blokada sperre annonser, sporere og annet uønsket innhold. Dette hjelper deg med å beskytte personvernet ditt, øke hastigheten på enheten din og lagre dataene dine.
Partner gateways provide additional locations. They are not fully managed by Blokada, but they do not have access to your encrypted traffic.
Those gateways are overloaded and temporarily unavailable.
This gateway is busy and does not accept new connections.
Control which of your devices connect to Blokada Plus.

Device ID:
%s

This is your current device.
Your account is being activated. This may take a few seconds. Thank you!

Enabling start on boot allows Blokada to be active at all times and protect your device. Please note the system always has higher priority and can overwrite this option, thus, if Blokada doesn\'t start up, take a look in your system\'s settings.

When enabled, Blokada will automatically choose recommended DNS servers to help speed up your Internet and protect your privacy. Otherwise, default DNS servers of your network are used. If you manually choose DNS servers in the Advanced section, this setting is ignored.
Tap the button below to open our help page. You can also use our social media to get help - we are on Telegram, Facebook, Reddit and Twitter.
Enjoying Blokada? Consider supporting us, so we can keep improving the app.
Help us introduce new features! Touch here for more.
Psst! Vi vil gjerne vite din mening.

Show your support by participating in our surveys and other events. We regularly reach out to our community for feedback about ideas and new development, in order to make sure we are working on what you want to see.
The Block is where we write about the development of the project, future plans, and discuss ideas.
Trykk her for introduksjonen til denne utgivelsen.
Din versjon av Blokada er foreldet og kan ikke fungere riktig. Vennligst last ned den nyeste versjonen for å fortsette å motta oppdateringer.
Det ser ut til at mange versjoner av Blokada er installert på enheten din. Vil du fjerne de andre versjonene og bare beholde en?
Please activate or restore your account to continue.
Could not connect to Blokada Plus. Try selecting another gateway.
Could not create your Blokada Plus account. Please try again later or contact us.
Enter your old account ID in order to restore your previous subscription. You may want to write down your current account ID before doing it, in case you make a mistake.
Account ID can only contain letters and numbers.
This account ID does not seem to be correct.
Please remove old device from your list of devices.
Når på, vil bølger animere hver gang en DNS-forespørsel er blokkert eller tillatt. Slå av hvis du opplever nedbremsing.
Sets the counter showing how many requests where blocked back to 0.

Changes the answer Blokada sends for blocked requests from \"host not found\" to an invalid ip. This can help on some ROMs which query other DNS servers if they get a \"host not found\" answer. Please note that this might slow down some apps which try to connect to the invalid address.
